product_name: Overland Equipment Nantucket Tote Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The laptop-friendly Overland Equipment Nantucket Tote Bag has a pass-through pocket for your wheeled luggage handle so you can take your mobile workstation with you whenever you travel. Zippered main compartment opens wide to allow access to zippered, padded neoprene laptop sleeve that fits most laptops with screens up to 15.5 in. Interior organizer panel stows pens, pencils and other essentials; exterior stash pocket keeps small items within reach and includes a key attachment. 1.5 in. molded straps can be slung over a shoulder or carried in your hand. Rugged ballistic nylon construction stands up to frequent travel. Closeout.
short_description: The laptop-friendly Overland Equipment Nantucket Tote Bag has a pass-through pocket for your wheeled luggage handle so you can take your mobile workstation with you whenever you travel.
